channel.title: Food doesn't work
channel.description: When someone eats on my server their hp stays the same. How do i fix this? (pkplanet source, delta)

item.title: Food doesn't work
item.dc:creator: @bluescapepkz bluescapepkz
item.description:
@bluescapepkz wrote:

I mean sharks/mantas, etc.

I found this in potions.java, idk if it would help

case 385: if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.foodDelay < 2000) return; c.foodDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); c.setAnimation(0x33D); //c.playSound(317, 000, 020); c.sM("You eat the shark."); if(c.currentHealth < c.playerLevel[c.playerHitpoints]){ c.sM("It heals some health."); } c.deleteItem(385, slot, 1); c.currentHealth += 20; if (c.currentHealth > c.playerLevel[c.playerHitpoints]) c.currentHealth = c.playerLevel[c.playerHitpoints]; c.sendQuest("" + c.currentHealth + "", 4016); break;

Read full topic

item.title: Food doesn't work

@s_p_i_d_a_z wrote:

In pkplanet, Swordfish and lots of other food aren’t coded in, easiest way to fix it, Find the sharks Copy it change all the info for Sword fish, GG.
